price: Silaa hanga guyyaa kaafamaniitti garaa isaa (qurxumichaa) keessa jiraata ture.
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
